sentences.sContent: He spread some butter on his bread.
sentences.sCn: 他在面包上涂了些黄油。

sentences.sContent: He has churned out more butter this week than last.
sentences.sCn: 他本周制作的黄油比上周多。

sentences.sContent: Cream your butter before adding the sugar and flour.
sentences.sCn: 加糖和面粉之前要先把黄油搅成乳脂状。

phrases.pCn: 涂黄油的面包；基本生活资料；生计
溶化牛油；溶化奶油；黄油溶液
对…说好话；恭维，阿谀奉承
n. 奶油夹心饼；加糖奶豆浆

words.tran: 谄媚的，奉承的；涂用黄油的；像黄油样的
食品室；配膳室；酒贮藏室

trans.tranOther: a soft yellow food made from cream or milk, used in cooking and for spreading on bread
